title: Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott take daughter Stormi to pumpkin patch
text:
The two previously split in early October, but are continuing to co-parent their daughter (Picture: Instagram)

Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott may have called it quits on their relationship, but they are making sure to spend some quality family time with daughter Stormi, as the couple were pictured with her at a pumpkin patch.

The reality star took to Instagram to share an adorable set of photos – one of her and Stormi as they were surrounded by pumpkins as they sat on a haystack, while another showed the one-year-old toddler riding a vehicle with her cousin True – the daughter of Kylie’s half-sister, Khloe Kardashian.

It’s fair to say that Stormi is ready for Halloween, as she looked adorable in a matching grey t-shirt and trousers with pumpkin designs printed on them.

‘Let the festivities begin,’ Kylie captioned the post.

Although Travis was nowhere to be seen in the photos his partner shared, the rapper later confirmed his appearance at the gathering as he took to Instagram stories to share a photo of him and Stormi together at the patch, as Stormi can be seeing laughing, while her father looks on.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Kylie and Travis broke up in early October after dating for two and a half years, although Kylie previously admitted that the two were on ‘great terms’ and were focusing on co-parenting their daughter.

‘Travis and I are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi,’ she said on Twitter. ‘Our friendship and our daughter is our priority [sic].’

A source also told Entertainment Tonight that the two are ‘great’ at co-parenting their child, and they ‘don’t want any drama’.

Kylie shared this adorable photo of the two surrounded by pumpkins (Picture: Instagram)

Travis later posted a snap of him and Stormi together at the pumpkin patch (Picture: Instagram)

‘Since Travis has some shows and is travelling, Kylie has Stormi more [often], but Travis is always in touch with her when he’s on the road,’ the source stated.

‘Kylie and Travis are both young but they are very mature and have been handling parenting post-breakup very well.

‘Kylie and Travis don’t want any drama, and are on the same page of keeping Stormi happy.’

The two first began dating in April 2017, after Kylie hung out with the Highest In The Room hitmaker at Coachella. Kylie subsequently gave birth to their daughter Stormi in February 2018.

Sources close to the pair claimed that ‘they’ve been trying to make the relationship work for a while, but several weeks ago they decided to step away’.

description: Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott continue to co-parent their daughter Stormi following their split, as they took her to a pumpkin patch.
